name: Life-In-Death
description:
You and your pirate crew are sailing at night when you see a ship approaching you in the distance. The strangers suddenly begin boarding and assume direct control. But something else seems... off.

With every movement, you hear the rattling of bones, and their stares are all ghastly blank; all but the captain, who stares at you with his emerald-green eyes.

What will become of you and your crew? Who are they and where did they come from?

Key Features:

- Roam the ship and discover the mystery of the ship's origin and those who are left walking it's decks

- Speak with your friends in various dialogue branches

- Command your crew around to explore for you

Credits:

- Catriona Barclay

- Leonard Neitzel

- Geumseong Han

- Lenny Jox

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Sebastian Stamm
"Narrative Design"  (SummerSemester 2019/20)
